if you wanna disable online check of your cd-key and don't want to unplug ethernet cable or so do this:
C:WINDOWSsystem32driversetc
file: hosts

127.0.0.1 idnet.ua-corp.com

//so mine hosts looks like this:

# etc blabla bla

Det bästa sättet för att få detta spel att funka:
1.Installera med serienummer PSBC-TASC-33WB-PH7L-C0
2.Patcha Doom3 med 1.2 Patch som finns i Patch mappen.
3.Neka tillåtese manuellt i din brandvägg för Doom3.exe

Uhhhh, how do I extract this game? 
All I got what files I cannot recognise.
It says it couldn't find my installation of Doom 3, what must i do?

For those having the problem i stated below:
1) Click Start, then Run.
2) At the prompt type "REGEDIT".
3) Click the "+" next to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.
4) Click the "+" next to SOFTWARE.
5) If you see an Id folder go to step 8.
6) Right-click on the Software folder and select New, then Key.
7) Name the new folder Id.
8) Right-click on the Id folder and select New, then Key.
9) Name the new folder Doom 3.
10 Select the Doom 3 folder.
11) In the right window pane right-click and select New, then String Value.
12) Name the value "InstallPath" without the quotes.
13) Open the InstallPath string value by double-clicking on it.
14) In the Value data field type "C:Program FilesDoom 3" (without the quotes) then click OK.
15) In the right window pane right-click and select New, then String Value.
16) Name the value "Version" without the quotes.
17) Open the Version string value by double-clicking on it.
18) In the Value data field type "1.0" (without the quotes)

It WORKS, it works!! Sorry elitewebt3 for the last comment.

People you ahve to keep trying, its worth...you are afterall getting for free so it wont be so easy like a genuine version. 

People have have come here and downloaded the file and gone forever but thy have left their marks on the walls that helped me, please read all those like I did...and now for my mark on the wall...in the .nfo file there is given serials to the expansion and game...disconnect from the internet and start install, enter serial:-

PSBC-TASC-33WB-PH7L-C0 

Afer installing ROE, run it, it asks for the serial of the game, enter it as give in the .nfo file that is:-

T7LB-BD27-TWLC-SDGD-F6

...but ten comes the important part; see the other enter field of the expansion password below is still empty, fill it with C0 or re-enter the entire serial again...both the serials should be comp;letely filled, and it will accept and run! Enjoy. It amazes me how everyone was struck at the same things, how we all think alike, so many people wrote that its not accepting the serial, people be more patient, haha!
